title: In Broad Daylight
description: In this Dateline classic, a quiet, leafy street in Long Beach, California where violent crimes are nearly unheard of, is shocked one November morning when a terrible murder happens. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 6, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
